data.title: The Walt Disney Company
data.text:

To contact a specific park or resort, please use the list below. For general parks and resorts inquiries, please visit this site.

For questions or concerns about movies, theatre, music or DVDs, please use the list below. For general movies, theatre, music and DVDs inquiries, please email us here.

For questions or concerns about a Disney television or radio network or show, please use the contact forms below. For general television and radio inquiries, please email us here.

CONTACT ESPN

Products, Toys, Merchandise and Publishing

For questions or concerns about a Disney product, please use the list below. For general products, toys, merchandise and publishing inquiries, please visit this site.

CONTACT CONSUMER PRODUCTS

Games, Apps and Websites

For questions or concerns about games, apps, and websites, please email us here.

Corporate Human Resources

For employee questions regarding retirement, pensions or W-2s, please email us here.

For employer verification, please visit this site.

Vulnerability Disclosure Program Submissions

The Disney Global Information Security Team accepts reports of potential security vulnerabilities that may provide an attacker with the ability to compromise the integrity, availability, or confidentiality of Disney products, services, or information technology infrastructure. If you believe you’ve found a qualifying security vulnerability in a Disney product or website, please visit https://hackerone.com/disney. Please note that, if you click the link, you will be redirected to HackerOne, a third-party site where you will find more information on submission guidelines and be able to submit a report, and that your activity on HackerOne will be governed by HackerOne’s privacy policy and other terms.

Donations, Sponsorships, Grants, and Outreach

For information about donations, sponsorships, grants or outreach, please consult Disney’s charitable giving guidelines.

Legal Permissions and Image Licensing

For inquiries regarding general permissions and requests to license Disney properties, please submit your request here.

For inquiries regarding any possible misuse of our intellectual property, you can report any concerns here.

Press Inquiries

For Press or Media inquiries only, please email us here.

Corporate Inquiries

For Corporate inquiries, please email us here.

Archives and Student Research Resources

For student projects on The Walt Disney Company, we suggest visiting our comprehensive archives site or email the Walt Disney Archives here.

Creative Ideas and Submissions

It is our policy not to accept any unsolicited creative ideas or submissions.

Licensing

For questions or concerns about licensing, please visit this site.

Corporate Social Responsibility

At Disney, we are committed to creating a better world. To learn more about our efforts, visit Impact.Disney.com or for specific inquiries, you may contact us at the links below.

CONTACT THE CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY TEAM

CONTACT THE SUPPLIER DIVERSITY TEAM

CONTACT THE SUPPLIER SUSTAINABILITY TEAM
